name: TIME_VAR_CREATION

global.set("MY_YEAR", msg.myyear)
global.set("MY_MONTH", msg.mymonth)
global.set("MY_MONTH_N", msg.mymonthn)
global.set("MY_DOM", msg.mydom)
global.set("MY_DAY", msg.myday)
global.set("MY_HOUR", msg.myhour)
global.set("MY_MINUTE", msg.myminute)
global.set("MY_TIME", msg.mytime)
return msg;

func:
node.log("Selected Status: "+ msg.topic)

msg.payload.type = "message"
msg.payload.options = {
    parse_mode :"Markdown",
    disable_web_page_preview : true
}

flow.set("Retry",0)


switch(msg.topic){
    
    case "Brightness":
        msg.payload.content = "*Brightness:*  " + global.get("lr_brightness")
        break;
        
    case "Temperature":
        msg.payload.content = "*Internal Temp:*  " + global.get("lr_temperature")
                                +"\n*External Temp:*  " + global.get("extTempWeather");

        break;
    
    case "Humidity":
        msg.payload.content = "*Humidity*:  "+ global.get("lr_humidity")

        break;
        
    case "Devices":
        msg.payload.content = "ðŸªŸ*Rollers*:"
                                +"\n  -  Livingroom yard:  _"+ global.get("lr_yardroller_pos") + "%_"
                                +"\n  -  Livingroom road:  _"+ global.get("lr_roadroller_pos") + "%_"
                                +"\n  -  small Bedroom:  _"+ global.get("smallbr_roller_pos") + "%_"
                                +"\n  -  main Bedroom:  _"+ global.get("mainbr_roller_pos") + "%_"
                                
                        + "\n\nðŸ’¡*Lights*:" 
                                +"\n  -  Ambient:  _"+ global.get("lr_ambientlight")+"_"
                                +"\n  -  Main:  _"+ global.get("lr_mainlight")+"_"
                                
                        + "\n\nðŸŒ¬*Conditioners*:"
                                +"\n  -  Livingroom:  _"+ global.get("lr_conditioner_state")+"_"
                                +"\n  -  Main Bedroom:  _"+ global.get("mainbr_conditioner_state")+"_"
                                +"\n  -  Small Bedroom:  _"+ global.get("smallbr_conditioner_state")+"_"
                        
                        + "\n\nðŸ”*Sensors*:"
                                +"\n  -  State:  _"+ global.get("lr_connection")+"_"
                        
        break;
    
}
return msg;

func:
var topics = [
        "shellies/home/livingroom/yard_roller/roller/0/command/pos",    //0
        "shellies/home/livingroom/road_roller/roller/0/command/pos",    //1
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pietro/roller/roller/0/command/pos",     //2
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pier/roller/roller/0/command/pos",       //3
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/1/command",              //4
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/0/command"               //5

];
global.set("topicArray", topics);

var powerTopics = [
        "shellies/home/livingroom/road_roller/roller/0/power",          //0
        "shellies/home/livingroom/yard_roller/roller/0/power",          //1
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pietro/roller/roller/0/power",           //2
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pier/roller/roller/0/power",             //3
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/0/power",                //4
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/1/power"                 //5
        
];
global.set("powerTopics", powerTopics);


var topicsSub = [
        "arduini/home/livingroom/Temperature",                          //0
        "arduini/home/livingroom/Humidity",                             //1
        "arduini/home/livingroom/Brightness",                           //2
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/0",                      //3
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/1",                      //4
        "shellies/home/livingroom/road_roller/roller/0/pos",            //5
        "shellies/home/livingroom/yard_roller/roller/0/pos",            //6
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pietro/roller/roller/0/pos",             //7
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pier/roller/roller/0/pos",               //8
        "arduini/home/livingroom/Human Presence",                       //9
        "arduini/home/livingroom/Sensors Connection"                    //10
]
global.set("subTopicArray", topicsSub);


var topicsMsg = [
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/0",                      //0
        "shellies/home/livingroom/lights/relay/1",                      //1
        "shellies/home/livingroom/road_roller/roller/0",                //2
        "shellies/home/livingroom/yard_roller/roller/0",                //3
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pietro/roller/roller/0",                 //4
        "shellies/home/bedroom_pier/roller/roller/0",                   //5
]
global.set("topicsMsg", topicsMsg);

var actuators=[
            "lrRollerShutter",      //0
            "yardRollerShutter",    //1
            "roadRollerShutter",    //2
            "mainRollerShutter",    //3
            "smallRollerShutter",   //4
            "lrLight",              //5
            "mainLight",            //6
            "ambientLight",         //7
            "yesOUT",               //8
            "CANCEL"                //9

];
global.set("actuArray", actuators);

var disc = "Sensors Disconnected";
global.set("disconn", disc)

var admins = [
    666955686, 
    672996534, 
    -1001593189841
];
global.set("admins", admins)


return msg;

name: ThingSpeak Payload
func:
msg.topic = 'channels/1813859/publish'

msg.payload =
            'field1='   + flow.get("field1")    //temperature
            +'&field2=' + flow.get("field2")    //humidity
            +'&field3=' + flow.get("field3")    //yardroller
            +'&field4=' + flow.get("field4")    //roadroller
            +'&field5=' + flow.get("field5")    //main bedroom
            +'&field6=' + flow.get("field6")    //small bedroom
            +'&field7=' + flow.get("field7")    //power consumption
            +'&status=MQTTPUBLISH'

node.log(msg.topic + " --> " + msg.payload)

return msg;
